attributes.action: Staffordshire Police to take a proactive role in dealing with burglaries
attributes.additional_details:
People are now living in fear to the extent it is affecting their lives and their family. 

We require Staffs Police to be seen taking an active role and assuring the public that this crime is being tackled as a number one priority.
attributes.background: There has been a massive rise in burglaries in Norton Canes, Burntwood, Heath Hayes, Hednesford and surrounding areas, with little or no response of tackling this problem. The rise of this crime is making householders feel vulnerable and likely to retaliate with possible fatal consequences,

rejection.details:
